HL2: Lost Coast è una mini campagna della durata di circa 20/30 minuti. Non fa parte della storia principale, anche se in origine questa mappa sarebbe dovuta essere parte integrante del gioco. In realtà questo mini capitolo serve per testare il vostro hardware, in modo tale da vedere come il vostro computer fa girare il gioco. I miei risultati sono stati buoni: con v-sync attivo e tutte le impostazioni grafiche al massimo, sono rimasto sui 60 FPS stabili.
Inoltre il pescatore di sanguisughe è uno dei personaggi più divertenti che io abbia mai incontrato nei videogiochi, nonostante sia presente per poco tempo.

If you got this with the Half-Life collection (which, I think is the only way to get it), I recommend you play this game first. There's no spoilers, it's very short (about an hour to complete, maybe less), and it introduces you to weapons, too.
The graphics are great, for 2005.

P.S, at the Church, you need to put one of the doors into the missle launcher.

《半条命 2：消失的海岸线》是 Valve 强化 Source 游戏引擎后所制作出来的‘高动态范围光映射(High-Dynamic Range lighting, HDR)’技术展示用之免费关卡扩充程序；Valve 公司的美术总监兼概念设计师 Victor Antonov 在当时表示，玩家电脑必须要有至少运行时脉为 3.2GHz 的处理器，1GB 大小容量的系统记忆体，以及现今顶级的显示卡，才比较能跑得动这款搭载 HDR 技术的《半条命 2：消失的海岸线》。
Příjemná kapitolka do kultovní HL série. Nic zásadního, nicméně potěší srdéčko každého fanatika. :)

음 사실 신기술 도입같은걸 테스트하기 위해 만든 단편 에피소드라지만 나름 흥미를 느꼈습니다. 사실 코멘터리 듣는법을 잘 몰라 한두개만 들어봤음에도 신기술 적용등이 잘 이뤄졌다는 것을 알 수 있었습니다. 3을 모르는 밸브가 하프2 모두 끝난 와중에 로스트 코스트를 출시한 이유에 대해서는 의문이지만...;; 혹시라도 모를 하프라이프3 또는 신작 게임+소스엔진2의 조화에 잘 이용해줄 것이라 믿고 추천 남깁니다.

This one is difficult. It is a technology demo for High Dynamic Range Rendering in the Source engine, set in the level supposed to take place after Highway 17 in Half Life 2. Even though the Source engine is falling behind compared to other engines nowadays, this game still looks great, and the added graphical effects make all areas express more detail. Aside from the technical stuff, everything else is the same as Half Life 2 in terms of how it works. I wont spoil anything.
Now, because it is only a technology demo, it is only about half an hour long, and there isn't much to do afterwards. Oh well. Not sure why it has such a high price individually, though is harmless on collections like the Orange Box. If you want to get it, get the Orange Box, as it comes with the other Half Life 2 games. Overall, it is effectively a small part of Half Life 2 with better visuals. I'm not going to give a rating, ill let my words speak for themselves.
Very short...

Half-life: Lost Coast - это даже не дополнение (учитывая её продолжительность в 30 мин максимум). Я знаю, что она задумывалась для показа всех возможностей движка Source и прекрасно с этим справилась. Там красиво всё. Но лично для меня графика в играх не столь важна, как сюжет, атмосфера и так далее. А этого в ней как раз таки нет! Она не вносит ничего нового во вселенную HL! Поэтому я бы её порекомендовал только тем, кто хочет позалипать на красивые шейдеры воды и тени. И ТО НЕ ЗА 600 рублей же! И повторюсь, что это моё личное мнение.

Lo jugué hace tiempo cuando compré el paquete completo de Hl2 a un precio bastante bajo y, aunque bastante corta, me gustó la misión. No decepciona.

Ahora veo el precio de $30 (casi $8 en oferta) y creo que no vale mucho la pena pagar ese precio por lo corto que es el juego. Te toma 2 horas, aproximadamente, pasarlo.

Yo gastaría ese dinero en otro juego o esperar a una promoción que valga la pena.

Es ist wie eine kleine Demo zum Spiel Half-Life 2. Also darf man kein ganzes Spiel erwarten. Man darf in einer relativ umfangreichen Mission ein kleines Dorf von der Tyrannei der Cobines befreien. Unter anderen darf man auch einen Heli zerstören ;). Also wer interesse am Spiel Half-Life 2 zeigt kann diese kleine Demo für einen kurzen Einblick nutzen.

Most of you who have played Half-Life 2, Episode one and Episode Two just like me have been asking yourselves "WHERE IS HALF-LIFE 3" while pulling out your hair. But you can't hurry perfection and to me with this addition Half-Life is becoming an epic game series this is not the longest expansion but it hold true to the Half-Life 2 way of thinking. Keep the story line gripping and make them shout for more and that’s what has happened with this, as well again not the longest but still great and for the price it's a bargain. I rate this 7/10.
